title: Tavares Discography
description:
This discography covers my collection of Tavares Albums from when I discovered them in 1975 (and having seen them at the Apollo Theatre in Glasgow, Scotland). They appeared on a joint billing with Heatwave, but the warm-up unbelievably was Geno Washington & The Ram Jam Band...........What a line-up!

The majority are Vinyl Rips, simply entitled "side 1" or "side 2", but all come with the relevant Art Work (covers) for both front & back.

Each side of an Album is therefore a single continuous track, as it would be if you listened to the original. If you don't like your music this way, then obviously you can use a file splitter and divide each "side" into several tracks, but I prefer to listen to my recordings as they were!

They were recorded at 192bps, which is the highest bit rate my Denon Turntable would allow.

Haven't seen any torrents for most Tavares Albums in the years that I have been looking (this is my first upload), so I hope you enjoy these?

Anthology (2004)
Check It Out (1974)
Future Bound (1978)
Greatest Hits (2000)
Hard Core Poetry (1974
In The City (1975)
Love Storm (1977)
Madam Butterfly (1978)
Sky High! (1976)
Supercharged (1980)
The Best of Tavares (1977)

My all time favourite Album from them is Sky High! When you listen, you'll soon know why
